title: Bug 2120: MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
description: The MRU (Most Recently Used) file list in the File menu is not being persisted between sessions.
OB: Currently, when the workbench is restarted, the previously opened files do not appear in the MRU list in the File menu.
EB: The files that were previously opened should be visible in the MRU list in the File menu even after restarting the workbench.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Launch the workbench. 2. Open 2 or 3 files. 3. Close the workbench. 4. Start the workbench again and check the File menu's MRU list.
